goal: Integrate Strategic Framework for Exponential Enhancement
final_decision: Execute complete re-architecture: LangGraph foundation + GNN reasoning + ACT-R memory + Formal verification
decision_rationale: Research reveals current architecture is fundamentally limited. Linear chains insufficient for autonomous agents. Must migrate to stateful graphs (LangGraph), enable true parallelism (no-GIL), implement cognitive architecture (ACT-R), and transform reasoning (GNN). This is not incremental - this is paradigm shift to exponential capability.
lessons_learned: LangGraph is THE production standard for stateful agents
Python 3.14 no-GIL enables true parallelism but requires explicit thread safety
Cognitive architectures (ACT-R, SOAR) provide blueprint for human-like reasoning
GNN reasoning on knowledge graphs unlocks relational intelligence
Dual-substrate memory (vector + graph) required for semantic + relational
Formal verification is non-negotiable for safe self-modification
Current architecture is a sophisticated prototype but structurally insufficient for exponential
This research provides complete blueprint for transformation
